name: The Big Good Sheep
description:
A funny game that we made as a part of school project and we're hoping to develop more on it in the future.

Developers:

  • Petter Willebrand Vinnberg –Lead Designer/Product Owner.
  • Nicklas Svanäng – Scrum Master/Backup artist.
  • Malek Sharabi - Lead Programmer/Designer.
  • Jesper Persson – Programmer/SFX Producer.
  • Cristiana de Lacerda – Lead artist.
